OCD.name: NMEA Proxy
OCD.description: Manages connections to a NMEA 0183 device and produces a Position for every GPS fix received. May also produce a composite Weather or Orientation object if these are sent by the NMEA device.

AD.name: Connection uri
AD.description: URI to connect to the gps device. Examples socket://192.168.0.116:2345 or btspp://001C881333D6:1;authenticate=false;encrypt=false;master=false

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Connection retry interval seconds
AD.description: Seconds to wait before retrying to establish a connection to the device.

AD.name: Production output rate governer
AD.description: Seconds to wait between sending Position, Weather or Orientation products.

AD.name: Consolidate sentences in message
AD.description: If true all NMEA sentences will be consolidated in a single message.

AD.name: Latitude measurement error radians
AD.description: Latitude accuracy in radians. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Longitude measurement error radians
AD.description: Longitude accuracy in radians. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Altitude measurement error meters
AD.description: Altitude accuracy in meters. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Pitch measurement error radians
AD.description: Pitch accuracy in radians. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Roll measurement error radians
AD.description: Roll accuracy in radians. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Barometric measurement error in percent
AD.description: Relative humidity accuracy in percent in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Air Temperature measurement error degrees Kelvin
AD.description: Air Temperature accuracy in degrees Kelvin Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Wind speed measurement error meters per second
AD.description: Wind speed accuracy in meters per second. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Wind Direction measurement error radians
AD.description: Wind direction accuracy in radians. Errors in measurement use the P95 rule. Actual values must fall in the range value +/- error 95% or more of the time.

AD.name: Producer scope
AD.description: The scope containing Position product. (Use full scope names)

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.
